verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Woe רֹעִ֗ים <WH7462> be unto the pastors מְאַבְּדִ֧ים <WH6> that destroy וּמְפִצִ֛ים <WH6327> and scatter אֶת־ <WH853> צֹ֥אן <WH6629> the sheep מַרְעִיתִ֖י <WH4830> of my pasture נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel עַֽל־ <WH5921> concerning הָרֹעִים֮ <WH7462> against the pastors הָרֹעִ֣ים <WH7462> that feed אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּי֒ <WH5971> my people אַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> You הֲפִצֹתֶ֤ם <WH6327> Ye have scattered אֶת־ <WH853> צֹאנִי֙ <WH6629> my flock וַתַּדִּח֔וּם <WH5080> and driven them away וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not פְקַדְתֶּ֖ם <WH6485> and have not visited אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am about פֹקֵ֧ד <WH6485> them behold I will visit עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5921> concerning אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֥עַ <WH7455> upon you the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4611> of your doings נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> Myself אֲקַבֵּץ֙ <WH6908> And I will gather אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> the remnant צֹאנִ֔י <WH6629> of my flock מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> of all הָאֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> out of all countries אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I הִדַּ֥חְתִּי <WH5080> whither I have driven אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> them וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֥י <WH7725> them and will bring them again אֶתְהֶ֛ן <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> unto נְוֵהֶ֖ן <WH5116> to their folds וּפָר֥וּ <WH6509> and they shall be fruitful וְרָבֽוּ׃ <WH7235> and increase

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֧י <WH6965> And I will set up עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> over רֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> shepherds וְרָע֑וּם <WH7462> over them which shall feed וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יִֽירְא֨וּ <WH3372> them and they shall fear ע֧וֹד <WH5750> any וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor יֵחַ֛תּוּ <WH2865> no more nor be dismayed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor יִפָּקֵ֖דוּ <WH6485> neither shall they be lacking נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> Behold the days בָּאִים֙ <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַהֲקִמֹתִ֥י <WH6965> that I will raise לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> unto David צֶ֣מַח <WH6780> Branch צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> a righteous וּמָ֤לַךְ <WH4427> shall reign מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> and a King וְהִשְׂכִּ֔יל <WH7919> and prosper וְעָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> and shall execute מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> and justice בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the earth

בְּיָמָיו֙ <WH3117> In his days תִּוָּשַׁ֣ע <WH3467> shall be saved יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> and Israel יִשְׁכֹּ֣ן <WH7931> shall dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> safely וְזֶה־ <WH2088> and this שְּׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> and this [is] his name אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִקְרְא֖וֹ <WH7121> whereby he shall be called יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD צִדְקֵֽנוּ׃ <WH6664> prosperity ס

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> behold יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> Therefore behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will no יֹ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> that they shall no more say עוֹד֙ <WH5750> longer חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who הֶעֱלָ֛ה <WH5927> which brought up אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> But The LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הֶעֱלָה֩ <WH5927> which brought up וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הֵבִ֜יא <WH935> and which led אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֨רַע <WH2233> the seed בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country צָפ֔וֹנָה <WH6828> out of the north וּמִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all הָֽאֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> and from all countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הִדַּחְתִּ֖ים <WH5080> whither I had driven שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> they וְיָשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> them and they shall dwell עַל־ <WH5921> on אַדְמָתָֽם׃ <WH127> in their own land ס

לַנְּבִאִ֞ים <WH5030> because of the prophets נִשְׁבַּ֧ר <WH7665> me is broken לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> Mine heart בְקִרְבִּ֗י <WH7130> within רָֽחֲפוּ֙ <WH7363> shake כָּל־ <WH3605> All עַצְמוֹתַ֔י <WH6106> all my bones הָיִ֙יתִי֙ <WH1961> have become כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man שִׁכּ֔וֹר <WH7910> I am like a drunken וּכְגֶ֖בֶר <WH1397> and like a man עֲבָ֣רוֹ <WH5674> hath overcome יָ֑יִן <WH3196> whom wine מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> because יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּמִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> accept דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> and because of the words קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> of his holiness

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for מְנָֽאֲפִים֙ <WH5003> of adulterers מָלְאָ֣ה <WH4390> is full הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> For the land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מִפְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> for because אָלָה֙ <WH423> of swearing אָבְלָ֣ה <WH56> mourneth הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land יָבְשׁ֖וּ <WH3001> are dried up נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> the pleasant places מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> of the wilderness וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> become מְרֽוּצָתָם֙ <WH4794> and their course רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> is evil וּגְבוּרָתָ֖ם <WH1369> and their force לֹא־ <WH3808> not כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> after that כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גַם־ <WH1571> again

נָבִ֥יא <WH5030> For both prophet גַם־ <WH1571> both כֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> and priest חָנֵ֑פוּ <WH2610> are profane גַּם־ <WH1571> Even בְּבֵיתִ֛י <WH1004> yea in my house מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> have I found רָעָתָ֖ם <WH7451> their wickedness נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> Therefore יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become דַרְכָּ֜ם <WH1870> Wherefore their way לָהֶ֗ם <WH1992> will be like כַּחֲלַקְלַקּוֹת֙ <WH2519> shall be unto them as slippery בָּֽאֲפֵלָ֔ה <WH653> [ways] in the darkness יִדַּ֖חוּ <WH1760> they shall be driven on וְנָ֣פְלוּ <WH5307> and fall בָ֑הּ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָבִ֨יא <WH935> therein for I will bring עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5921> and רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> evil שְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> upon them [even] the year פְּקֻדָּתָ֖ם <WH6486> of their visitation נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

וּבִנְבִיאֵ֥י <WH5030> in the prophets שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> And I have seen תִפְלָ֑ה <WH8604> folly הִנַּבְּא֣וּ <WH5012> they prophesied בַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> in Baal וַיַּתְע֥וּ <WH8582> to err אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> and caused my people אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel ס

וּבִנְבִאֵ֨י <WH5030> also in the prophets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> I have seen שַׁעֲרוּרָ֗ה <WH8186> an horrible thing נָא֞וֹף <WH5003> they commit adultery וְהָלֹ֤ךְ <WH1980> and walk בַּשֶּׁ֙קֶר֙ <WH8267> in lies וְחִזְּקוּ֙ <WH2388> they strengthen יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> also the hands מְרֵעִ֔ים <WH7489> of evildoers לְבִ֨לְתִּי־ <WH1115> no שָׁ֔בוּ <WH7725> doth return אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> that none מֵרָֽעָת֑וֹ <WH7451> from his wickedness הָֽיוּ־ <WH1961> have become לִ֤י כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> All כִּסְדֹ֔ם <WH5467> they are all of them unto me as Sodom וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <WH3427> and the inhabitants כַּעֲמֹרָֽה׃ <WH6017> thereof as Gomorrah ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts עַל־ <WH5921> concerning הַנְּבִאִ֔ים <WH5030> concerning the prophets הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am going מַאֲכִ֤יל <WH398> Behold I will feed אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> לַֽעֲנָ֔ה <WH3939> them with wormwood וְהִשְׁקִתִ֖ים <WH8248> and make them drink מֵי־ <WH4325> the water רֹ֑אשׁ <WH7219> of gall כִּ֗י <WH3588> for מֵאֵת֙ <WH853> נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> for from the prophets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem יָצְאָ֥ה <WH3318> gone forth חֲנֻפָּ֖ה <WH2613> is profaneness לְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> into all the land פ

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> Hearken עַל־ <WH5921> unto דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> not unto the words הַנְּבִאִים֙ <WH5030> of the prophets הַנִּבְּאִ֣ים <WH5012> that prophesy לָכֶ֔ם מַהְבִּלִ֥ים <WH1891> unto you they make you vain הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> חֲז֤וֹן <WH2377> a vision לִבָּם֙ <WH3820> of their own heart יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> they speak לֹ֖א <WH3808> from מִפִּ֥י <WH6310> [and] not out of the mouth יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

אֹמְרִ֤ים <WH559> They say אָמוֹר֙ <WH559> still לִֽמְנַאֲצַ֔י <WH5006> unto them that despise דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> me The LORD שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> Ye shall have peace יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will have לָכֶ֑ם וְ֠כֹל <WH3605> who הֹלֵ֞ךְ <WH1980> unto every one that walketh בִּשְׁרִר֤וּת <WH8307> after the imagination לִבּוֹ֙ <WH3820> of his own heart אָֽמְר֔וּ <WH559> and they say לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not תָב֥וֹא <WH935> shall come עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH5921> and רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> No evil

כִּ֣י <WH3588> But מִ֤י <WH4310> who עָמַד֙ <WH5975> For who hath stood בְּס֣וֹד <WH5475> in the counsel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְיֵ֖רֶא <WH7200> and hath perceived וְיִשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> and heard אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> his word מִֽי־ <WH4310> who הִקְשִׁ֥יב <WH7181> has given [דְּבָרִי כ] (דְּבָרֹ֖ו <WH1697> to his word ק) וַיִּשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> and heard ס

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> Behold סַעֲרַ֣ת <WH5591> Behold a whirlwind יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD חֵמָה֙ <WH2534> in fury יָֽצְאָ֔ה <WH3318> is gone forth וְסַ֖עַר <WH5591> whirlwind מִתְחוֹלֵ֑ל <WH2342> even a grievous עַ֛ל <WH5921> on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head רְשָׁעִ֖ים <WH7563> of the wicked יָחֽוּל׃ <WH2342> it shall fall grievously

לֹ֤א <WH3808> will not יָשׁוּב֙ <WH7725> shall not return אַף־ <WH639> The anger יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַד־ <WH5704> Until עֲשֹׂת֥וֹ <WH6213> until he have executed וְעַד־ <WH5704> Until הֲקִימ֖וֹ <WH6965> and till he have performed מְזִמּ֣וֹת <WH4209> the thoughts לִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> of his heart בְּאַֽחֲרִית֙ <WH319> in the latter הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> days תִּתְבּ֥וֹנְנוּ <WH995> ye shall consider בָ֖הּ בִּינָֽה׃ <WH998> it perfectly

לֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁלַ֥חְתִּי <WH7971> I have not sent אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> these prophets וְהֵ֣ם <WH1992> they רָ֑צוּ <WH7323> yet they ran לֹא־ <WH3808> did not דִבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> I have not spoken אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> about וְהֵ֥ם <WH1992> they נִבָּֽאוּ׃ <WH5012> to them yet they prophesied

וְאִֽם־ <WH518> if עָמְד֖וּ <WH5975> But if they had stood בְּסוֹדִ֑י <WH5475> in my counsel וְיַשְׁמִ֤עוּ <WH8085> to hear דְבָרַי֙ <WH1697> my words אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> and had caused my people וִֽישִׁבוּם֙ <WH7725> then they should have turned מִדַּרְכָּ֣ם <WH1870> way הָרָ֔ע <WH7451> them from their evil וּמֵרֹ֖עַ <WH7455> and from the evil מַֽעַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH4611> of their doings ס

הַאֱלֹהֵ֧י <WH430> [Am] I a God מִקָּרֹ֛ב <WH7138> at hand אָ֖נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> and not a God מֵרָחֹֽק׃ <WH7350> far

אִם־ <WH518> lo יִסָּתֵ֨ר <WH5641> hide אִ֧ישׁ <WH376> Can any בַּמִּסְתָּרִ֛ים <WH4565> himself in secret places וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> I לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֶרְאֶ֖נּוּ <WH7200> that I shall not see נְאֻם־ <WH5002> him? saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> not אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֧יִם <WH8064> heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> common אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I מָלֵ֖א <WH4390> fill נְאֻם־ <WH5002> declares יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <WH8085> I have heard אֵ֤ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what אָֽמְרוּ֙ <WH559> said הַנְּבִאִ֔ים <WH5030> what the prophets הַֽנִּבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> that prophesy בִּשְׁמִ֛י <WH8034> in my name שֶׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> lies לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying חָלַ֖מְתִּי <WH2492> I have dreamed חָלָֽמְתִּי׃ <WH2492> I have dreamed

עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֗י <WH4970> How הֲיֵ֛שׁ <WH3426> How long shall [this] be בְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> in the heart הַנְּבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> of the prophets נִבְּאֵ֣י <WH5012> that prophesy הַשָּׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> falsehood וּנְבִיאֵ֖י <WH5030> even prophets תַּרְמִ֥ת <WH8649> of the deceit לִבָּֽם׃ <WH3820> of their own heart
